sentences.en: An adversary is more hurt by desertion than by slaughter -- Vegetius.
sentences.cn: 遗弃,将比屠杀更能刺痛你的敌手——维吉休斯.

sentences.en: Both of the wrestlers tried to tumble the adversary with all their strength.
sentences.cn: 双方摔跤运动员都使出了全身气力想把对手摔倒.

sentences.en: Elliott crossed the finish line just half a second behind his adversary.
sentences.cn: 埃利奥特跨过终点线时仅比对手落后半秒钟。

sentences.en: He is wrestling with his adversary.
He lunged ( out ) at his adversary.
He saw her as his main adversary within the company.
sentences.cn: 他将她视为公司中主要的对手.

sentences.en: He was as devious as his adversary was ruthless.
sentences.cn: 他的对手冷酷,他也同样阴险.

sentences.en: He was dismayed at the size of his adversary.
sentences.cn: 对手的魁伟身材使他丧失了勇气.

sentences.en: Hesitation encourages the adversary to persevere, may be even to raise the ante.
sentences.cn: 犹豫不决只会鼓励敌人顽固坚持, 甚至下新的赌注.

sentences.en: His business rivals knew they could expect no quarter from such a ruthless adversary.
sentences.cn: 他的业务对手都知道不可指望他这样无情的人会手软.

sentences.en: His intrepid adversary prepared to close for the thirteenth time.
sentences.cn: 他那勇敢的对手准备打第十三回合.

sentences.en: If we use exponentiation to encrypt or decrypt , the adversary can use logarithm to attack .
sentences.cn: 如果我们运用求幂运算来加密和解密，对手就可以运用对数进行攻击。

sentences.en: The adversary went about seeking whomever he might devour.
sentences.cn: 魔鬼四处寻找可噬的人.

sentences.en: These verbs mean to get the better of an adversary.
sentences.cn: 这些动词都表示战胜对手的意思.

sentences.en: They tell us, sir, that we are weak -- unable to cope with so formidable an adversary.
sentences.cn: 先生，他们告诉我们，我们是弱小的——不能应付如此强大的对手。

sentences.en: They will do anything to undermine their adversary's reputation.
sentences.cn: 他们会不择手段地去损害对手的名誉.

trans.tran_en: a country or person you are fighting or competing against
